valueProp.title: What Powalyze
valueProp.intro: Most firms sell you resources. We sell you results. Powalyze intervenes where traditional methods fail: in zones of high uncertainty and strong technical complexity.
valueProp.p1Desc: No more unreadable reports. We translate technical complexity into clear business decisions.
valueProp.p2Desc: No theory. We are operators who secure your critical deliverables.
valueProp.p3Desc: Our recommendations serve your interests, not those of major software publishers.
valueProp.p4Desc: We connect strategy (C-Level) with field reality (Engineering) without signal loss.

cta.title: Ready to transform your
cta.subtitle: Discover how Powalyze can structure, track and optimize your strategic projects in less than 30 days.

caseStudies.title: Success stories
caseStudies.subtitle: Real transformations. Measurable results.
caseStudies.ctaText: Your case could be the next Powalyze success story

case1.title: Banking merger
case1.subtitle: IT systems harmonization
case1.challenge: Two banks merging with incompatible legacy systems. Risk: -25% operational productivity.
case1.solution: Strategic PMO implementation with clearly defined IT governance. Real-time dashboards for risk tracking.

case2.title: Agile transformation
case2.subtitle: Waterfall to SAFe migration
case2.challenge: Insurance with Waterfall process. Release cycles: 18 months. Critical time-to-market.
case2.solution: SAFe implementation with PMO coaching. Agile dashboards for portfolio visibility. CI/CD automation.

case3.title: Cloud governance
case3.subtitle: FinOps & cost optimization
case3.challenge: Industrial group with uncontrolled cloud spending. Budget +45% in 1 year. No visibility.
case3.solution: Cloud governance with tagging & chargeback. FinOps dashboards. Scaling automation. Reservation optimization.

banner.title: Privacy Preferences
banner.description: We use cookies to improve your experience, analyze usage, and personalize content. Select your preferences.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.desc: Required for basic functionality, navigation and authentication.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
